Package renderer.scene

Class Texture

java.lang.Object
renderer.scene.Texture
public class Texture extends Object
This represents a texture with transparency (RGBA).

  • Constructor Details

    • Texture

      public Texture(int width, int height, String name)
      Create an empty Texture with the given size and name.
      Parameters:
      name - String name for this Texture
      width - width of this Texture
      height - height of this Texture

    • Texture

      public Texture(String name, int width, int height, int[] data)
      Create a Texture directly from RGBA pixel data.

      The data array is assumed to contain 4 * width * height ints where every four ints represent the RGBA color and transparency values for a pixel of the texture.

      Parameters:
      name - String name for this Texture
      width - width of this Texture
      height - height of this Texture
      data - array holding the RGBA color values for each pixel of this Texture

    • Texture

      public Texture(String filename)
      Create a Texture from pixel data in a PPM file.
      Parameters:
      inputFileName - must name a PPM image file with magic number P6.

    • Texture

      public Texture(FrameBuffer.Viewport vp)
      Create a Texture from a FrameBuffer's FrameBuffer.Viewport
      Parameters:
      vp - FrameBuffer.Viewport whose pixel data will become a Texture
